seg.line: 或曰：「書與經同，而世不尚，治之可乎？」

seg.line: 或曰：「耕不穫，獵不饗，耕獵乎？」

tls:text.tls:srcline: 或曰：「耕不穫，獵不饗，耕獵乎？」
tls:text.tls:line: The interlocutor continued: "But to cultivate the land but not to harvest, to hunt but not to feast on the catch – is that (really) ploughing and hunting?"

sense.def: cultivate the land; engage in agriculture, till the fields

tls:text.tls:srcline: 或曰：「耕不穫，獵不饗，耕獵乎？」
tls:text.tls:line: The interlocutor continued: "But to cultivate the land but not to harvest, to hunt but not to feast on the catch – is that (really) ploughing and hunting?"

sense.def: to harvest grain, reap the harvest

tls:text.tls:srcline: 或曰：「耕不穫，獵不饗，耕獵乎？」
tls:text.tls:line: The interlocutor continued: "But to cultivate the land but not to harvest, to hunt but not to feast on the catch – is that (really) ploughing and hunting?"

sense.def: hunt (as a professional hunter); go on a hunt, hunt as a pleasure excursion

tls:text.tls:srcline: 或曰：「耕不穫，獵不饗，耕獵乎？」
